title: Cross DJ Pro v3.0.6 APK (Android)
description:
The 1st pro DJ app on Android. Mix tracks in perfect sync on a powerful audio engine. Engineered by Mixvibes, digital DJing pioneer for 15 years!


â€œPromises to be the first professional DJ experience for Androidâ€ (DJWORX)
"Good looks, great sounding FX, great sync engine, â€˜slipâ€™ mode, proper loops and cues." (DJ TechTools)
â€œChallenging our notions of what can be done on a touchscreenâ€ (Android Police)


MIX IN PERFECT SYNC:
Accurate BPM detection, down to the last decimal.
Stable Sync: one-press, and the 2 tracks never go out of phase.
Split Mono: Pre-listen your tracks before mixing them
Manual pitch & pitch bend.
Beat-grid editing, to make sure that your old tracks sync correctly.
Parallel waveforms mode to visually check if your tracks are synced.
New Quantize feature : hot cues and loops are automatically set on the beat.
Smart-seek: Tap on the waveform to fast-forward & get a seamless jump.
Automix: Let Cross DJ mix your tracks automatically, from any sources (playlist, album, etc.)
OUTSTANDING AUDIO PERFORMANCE:
Best performance for an Android DJ app.
Low latency: music reacts instantly to your actions.
Extremely realistic scratch sound.
15 effects (Bi-filter, Low-pass, Hi-Pass, Delay, Echo, Phaser, Flanger, Cut, Crush, Bliss, Brake, Roll, etc.)
No load time when starting-up the app.
INTUITIVE INTERFACE:
2 turntables, crossfader, full-fledged 3-band EQ mixer.
Large buttons, optimized for small screens. 
Direct access to your music: mix your deviceâ€™s MP3s, AAC, FLAC and more.
Multiple sorting options: Sort your library by title, artist, album, BPM or length.
Large control pads: XY effect pad, 16 hot-cues pads.
HQ live recording of your mixes.
Display remaining time of your tracks.
Optimized for mobile & tablet.

FULL VERSION, ALL FX INCLUDED - NO ADDITIONAL PURCHASES, NO POP-UPS

What's in this version : (Updated : 8 April 2016)
- Improve sync with keylock
- Full compatibility with devices running Android M.
- MIDI control is now compatible with Android M.
- Cross DJ 3.0 for Android supports multichannel audio on devices running Android Marshmallow.
- Design improvement: a scroll bar has been added to the library, making navigation through the songs much easier.
- Many bug fixes.
Required Android O/S : 4.1+
